title: Don’t California the World | Guest: Bridget Phetasy | 10/28/21
description:
Glenn takes on a Facebook-backed “fact check” about the real reason gas prices are up. Ahead of the U.N.’s COP26 climate change conference, Biden wants to turn the world into California. Southwest Airlines Pilots Association president Capt. Casey Murray returns after a judge rejected pilots’ bid to block Southwest’s vaccine mandate. Glenn gives an update on his mental health. It’s the anniversary of the Statue of Liberty, and Glenn sets the record straight about what it symbolizes. Theatre professor Steve Earnest joins to tell his story as a group of students demand that he be fired for not being outraged enough. Comedian Bridget Phetasy joins Glenn to talk life in authoritarian California, depression, and vaccine mandates.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
